warning_message: Soft bedding in cribs significantly increases SIDS and suffocation risk
safe_alternative: Bare crib with tight-fitting sheet only. No blankets, pillows, or bumpers

warning_message: Honey can contain spores causing infant botulism in babies under 12 months
safe_alternative: No honey for children under 1 year old - use age-appropriate sweeteners if needed

warning_message: Rear-facing seats provide critical head/neck protection for developing spines
safe_alternative: Keep children rear-facing until at least age 2 or max height/weight for seat

warning_message: Bed-sharing increases SIDS risk and risk of overlay suffocation
safe_alternative: Room share with baby on separate sleep surface (crib/bassinet) near bed

warning_message: Adding cereal to bottles is a choking hazard and doesn't help sleep
safe_alternative: Only add cereal to bottles if specifically prescribed by pediatrician for reflux

warning_message: Baby walkers cause thousands of injuries yearly and delay motor development
safe_alternative: Use stationary activity centers, or supervised tummy/floor time

warning_message: Water for infants under 6 months can cause water intoxication and electrolyte imbalance
safe_alternative: Breast milk or formula provides all hydration needed before 6 months

warning_message: Cars heat to deadly temperatures in minutes, even with windows cracked
safe_alternative: Never leave children unattended in vehicles, even briefly
